workshoptitle: Send data from Oracle Cloud Infrastructure GoldenGate to Oracle GoldenGate

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create OCI GoldenGate resources
tutorials.description: Create your OCI GoldenGate deployment and database registration

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Connect Oracle GoldenGate to Autonomous Data Warehouse
tutorials.description: Connect Oracle GoldenGate to its target database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a trusted connection between Oracle GoldenGate and OCI GoldenGate
tutorials.description: Use a self-signed certificate to create a trusted connection

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Send the OCI GoldenGate Trail file to Oracle GoldenGate
tutorials.description: Create an Extract, Receiver Path, and Replicat

tutorials.title: Lab 5: (Optional) Use Admin Client to view Extract statistics and Log messages
tutorials.description: Connect to the Marketplace Oracle GoldenGate Admin Client

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
